creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Feather rosette with woven handle and cord. Beige feathers on outside, white and iridescent dark feathers in center. Opens like a circular fan. Late Intermediate Period? Diameter 15 in. when open, 4 in. when closed. Source Transfer from Record Book, 1977 Credit Line John R. van Derlip Fund RBL 47.605 [Stendahl Collection]
dimension: Diameter 15 in. when opened, 4 in. when closed
title: Feather Rosette
